title: Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", 1770–75
medium: Pen and ink, brush and various water colors on paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
description: Shown in profile turned right is a window with a curtain.  In the panel beside hands a garland from a bow-knot and rises a scroll obliquely from the lower right corner.  The panels above and below the bar, which is decorated like 2 with festoons hanging from a horizontal rope.  At the upper corners of the central panel are cornucopias.  The roof is triangular and has on top and the lower corners royal crowns.  Tassels hang down.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", 1770–75.
1770–75. Pen and ink, brush and various water colors on paper. Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander. 1900-1-5.
